title: nolimit365
author: nolimit365
content: We would like to welcome all dear members to the BitcoinTalk !Nolimit365.com is a new Online Gaming Platform which offers Top Sportsbook Product and Odds, Online Casino , Live Casino, Skill Games and Online Poker.We support fast payments with Debit Card and Crypto Payments !We offer 10 Free Spins for EGT / NETent Exclusive for Members of Bitcoin Talk Forum ! ( After your registration send email at info@nolimit365.com with your Customer ID - Username and refer us you see our post here "5 FREE SPINS WITHOUT DEPOSIT FOR EGT OR NETENT1. Maximum Cashout in real money is 100 EUR / USD etc2. If the Player chooses to forfeit a bonus, the bonus money and any accumulated winnings will be removed from their account. Bonuses can only be awarded once per person (email or IP) unless stated otherwise.3. If the Player has real money and bonus money in their account, real money gets exhausted before the bonus money is used. The Player can only claim one Casino bonus at a time.4. If we suspect the Player is abusing one of our bonuses, we reserve the right to withhold or seize any winnings gained as a result of fraudulent or otherwise unfair practices. We reserve the right to change these terms at our discretion and at any time.For get 5 Free Spins without Deposit for EGT or NETENT send email atinfo@nolimit365.com with your customer ID and we will add you 5 free spins in random game.SPORTSBOOK BONUS 100% UP TO 250 € / $100% Bonus up to 250 € / $ for Sports Betting.1. Minimum deposit amount to claim any deposit bonus is € 50 /$ 50.2. The bonus and the first deposit amount must be wagered at least 17 times.3. The bonus must be wagered on sports bets with odds of 1.90 or higher.4. The conditions must be met within 30 days of the bonus award date ( in time limit ).5. A bet is considered to be made within the time limit if the bets on the relevant events are evaluated within the time limit.6. Bets paid out with 'Cash Out' are not subject to the bonus conditions.7. System bets and Asian Handicap Markets also do not meet the bonus requirements.8. When you have an active sports bonus, it is not allowed to bet on more outcomes from the same bet type on the same match. For example 1x2 betting. If you do so, this will result in cancellation of the bets and bonus amount, and may result in cancellation of potential winnings.CASINO SLOT BONUS 100% UP TO 500 € / $1. All Casino Slot games contribute 100% to wagering.The player has to wager bonus 45x times deposit and bonus amount. 2. The Player cannot deposit or withdraw until the wagering requirement of an active bonus has been completed, or they choose to forfeit the bonus.3. If the Player chooses to forfeit a bonus, the bonus money and any accumulated winnings will be removed from their account. Bonuses can only be awarded once per person (email or IP) unless stated otherwise.4. The minimum deposit amount for a deposit bonus is €205. If the Player has real money and bonus money in their account, real money gets exhausted before the bonus money is used. The Player can only claim one Live Casino bonus at a time.6. If we suspect the Player is abusing one of our bonuses, we reserve the right to withhold or seize any winnings gained as a result of fraudulent or otherwise unfair practices.We reserve the right to change these terms at our discretion and at any time.LIVE CASINO DEPOSIT BONUS 50% UP TO 300 € / $1.Live casino games contribute 100% to wagering.The player has to wager bonus 60x times. 2. The Player cannot deposit or withdraw until the wagering requirement of an active bonus has been completed, or they choose to forfeit the bonus.3. If the Player chooses to forfeit a bonus, the bonus money and any accumulated winnings will be removed from their account. Bonuses can only be awarded once per person (email or IP) unless stated otherwise.4. The minimum deposit amount for a deposit bonus is €20.5. If the Player has real money and bonus money in their account, real money gets exhausted before the bonus money is used.The Player can only claim one Live Casino bonus at a time.6. If we suspect the Player is abusing one of our bonuses, we reserve the right to withhold or seize any winnings gained as a result of fraudulent or otherwise unfair practices.We reserve the right to change these terms at our discretion and at any time.POKER RAKEBACK UP TO 50%We can offer you up to 50% Rakeback Deal in Poker Tables every week in your account.Check our gaming platform in https://www.nolimit365.com

comments.body: Welcome.By any chance, are you a part of bet365? It looks like them.It says you have a 250 EURO deposit bonus. But have a requirement of wagering 17x time on sportsbet with a minimum odd of 1.90, I think this is quite hard.Buy a copper membership to present the ANN in more professionally with a great design.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: I was about to register until I saw this I'm not comfortable asking for my vital information when I am just joining it should be when they ask you because your account has an issue, checking Whois they are just a month old, I could trust them if they are an old and reputable casino but they haven't proved anything yet. Domain:nolimit365.comRegistrar:GoDaddy.com, LLCRegistered On:2022-10-27Expires On:2023-10-27Updated On:2022-10-27Status:clientDeleteProhibitedclientRenewProhibitedclientTransferProhibitedclientUpdateProhibitedName Servers:ken.ns.cloudflare.comlady.ns.cloudflare.com

comments.author: safari88
comments.body: I think you should really watch out for this site. We often see an unlicensed gambling site. That in itself does not have to be a problem at all, but this site has put a license on it from a gambling license that does not exist at all, namely from the site "https://verification.fair-gaming.com/nolimit365.html" - FAKE LICENSEThe fair-gaming.com site is a non-existent organization and does NOT issue licenses. So it all seems to have been set up by the gambling site itself and putting together a fake certificate. They really underestimated the power of the forum, people see things like that very quickly.So I would advise not to play here. The fact that they put a fake license on it should be a red flag right away.As an aside, the registration button is also untraceable

comments.author: _Loki_
comments.body: How do you register for the site? I can't find anywhere where I can do it.

comments.body: Well i opened your casino on my ipad and noticed many things on it the template is so much like a copy of bet365 which makes it a bit unprofessional unless it’s a related with them, beside that i couldn’t find a register button on mobile version of your casino so i must say it’s a failure on mobile version.And you need to upgrade your promoting topic here and get a copper membership to put pictures and create a better design here. The offers and bonuses are cool and we expect you to be legit and pay winners after completing the conditions you set

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: A new casino platform, not more than a month ago, and also, probably with a fake license, I will personally advice every one to stay away from this one.@OP, welcome to the forum by the way, the forum is of course accommodating to every one and every business, but any one and any business can only strive here if you come clean and legit.First, forgive me, but your site looks like something that was built in a hurry, really lacks a good design, but this is not a problem at all,Second, which i think is the main problem is that the supposedly license you posted on your site probably fake, you can check that out and see that the web page to verify the license - which you linked in the license badge - is not opening, so clearly, it's fake..Maybe you might want to prove otherwise to the community...

Is this because of the bonus? these bonuses are making certain people not research before creating an account at the casino and then when they are deceived and robbed they will come here to complain

comments.author: nolimit365
comments.body: Hello to all. We are here for support and answer in all questions.We are a new online casino.We support a lot of gaming providers and we would like give the best experience to every player.We are not here or in any other forum for advertise or post without reason.Of course we are not here to scam anyone ( affiliate or customer )If you want you can register and try our platform.For anyone can not see the registration form, please inform us what country are you based for check it with our developers.About license is a new organization - company behind them which verify the fair of our product.We support Debit Card Payments, Bank Payments and Crypto Payments. We are a new company and new online gaming site.I hope you realy enjoy our platform.We take care every comment - feedback.For thoese who tell to stay away from our casino , is their opinion and we respect it.Time will tell...  We are here for staying and offer the best from our side.
